definition: to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: It is a Strebe equal-area projection, polyconic.
sentences.chinese: 它是一幅斯特雷貝等積多圓錐投影圖。

sentences.english: This paper studies the grating projective images compression technology based on Discrete Cosine Transformation(DCT).
sentences.chinese: 文中研究了基於離散餘弦變換的光柵投影圖的壓縮。

sentences.english: Mosaic may appear when zooming in on the voxel surface.
sentences.chinese: 體素表面投影圖象的放大操作容易產生馬賽克。

sentences.english: The images were re-projected into an orthographic map projection.
sentences.chinese: 該圖像被重新投影成正射投影圖。

sentences.english: The projection of KPB crystal structure and schematic diagram of twinning structure have been drawn.
sentences.chinese: 我們繪製了該晶體的結構投影圖和孿晶結構示意圖。

sentences.english: With converse thinking, reverse research based on axonometric projection is brought forward.
sentences.chinese: 運用逆向思維，提出基於正軸測投影圖的反求研究。

sentences.english: Such a projection is called axonometric projection.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的投影圖稱爲軸測圖。
